title: Erskineville kings
creator_credit: Alan White, Julio Caro, @Radical Media and Beyond Films
brief_description: Barky (Marty Denniss) returns to Sydney after a two-year absence when he hears of the death of his father. He is reunited with his brother (Hugh Jackman) and friends and we learn about their unresolved issues with each other and their father. Cast includes Aaron Blabey, Andrew Wholley, Joel Edgerton and Leah Vandenberg. First time feature produced and directed by Alan White.
